alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hamilton County through 500 PM EDT... At 424 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Lewey Lake Campground, or 10 miles northwest of Speculator, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Speculator, Lake Pleasant, Moffitt Beach Campground, Lewey Lake Campground, Sled Harbor, Sabael, Perkins Clearing, Sagamore, West Canada Lakes, Sagamore Lake and Kamp Kill Kare. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
